constraints.label: Mentor Unavailability Constraint
constraints.definition: The absence of Engineer B's guidance and quality assurance review capability
constraints.impact: Forced reliance on alternative methods for quality assurance
constraints.workaround_attempted: Use of AI tools to supplement missing mentorship
constraints.source_text: Engineer B recently retired and was no longer available to Engineer A in a work capacity

constraints.label: Tool Inexperience Constraint
constraints.definition: Lack of prior experience with the specific AI software tools being used
constraints.impact: Limited understanding of AI tool capabilities, limitations, and proper use
constraints.source_text: The AI drafting software was new to the market and Engineer A had no previous experience with the tool

constraints.label: Open-Source Data Exposure
constraints.definition: The inherent risk of data exposure when using open-source AI platforms
constraints.impact: Client information potentially placed in public domain
constraints.source_text: The AI drafting software was also open-sourced

constraints.label: Writing Confidence Limitation
constraints.definition: Engineer A's personal uncertainty about technical writing abilities
constraints.impact: Motivated seeking alternative approaches to report drafting
constraints.source_text: personally, less confident in their technical writing

constraints.label: Local Regulatory Requirements
constraints.definition: Mandatory safety feature requirements imposed by local regulations
constraints.impact: All designs must include specified safety features
constraints.source_text: key safety features required by local regulations

constraints.label: State Seal Requirements
constraints.definition: Legal requirements governing when and how engineers may apply their professional seal
constraints.impact: Sealed documents carry legal weight and professional responsibility
constraints.source_text: applied their seal consistent with state law
